thread.title: Sheikh Hamdan calls on youth to share ideas at Dubai forum
thread.title_full: Sheikh Hamdan calls on youth to share ideas at Dubai forum | The National

author: thenational.ae
title: Sheikh Hamdan calls on youth to share ideas at Dubai forum
text:
DUBAI // Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed, Crown Prince of Dubai, is calling on Arab youth to participate in an idea-sharing forum. 
Dardachat Arabia’s first event will be held at the Higher Colleges of Technology, Men’s College, in Dubai next week, on October 20.
The forum hosts young entrepreneurs and other individuals who will share experiences, ideas and successes in overcoming challenging situations. The event is aimed at highlighting inspiring personalities and contributions that have made a difference in communities. 
Forum attendees will have the opportunity to meet influential and inspiring personalities face to face and listen to their success stories. 
Sheikh Hamdan said Dardachat Arabia sought to attract Arab youth innovators, discover new talent and highlight their achievements. 
“Arab youth are the key drivers of the future and contributors to development and social progress,” Sheikh Hamdan said. “We have to provide these innovators the appropriate platform to serve as role models for future generations and pave the way for more achievements and inspiring stories.”
The initiative is also part of the UAE Government’s aim to attract international talent and creativity.

newsdesk@thenational.ae
